English: Stevenson screen (white box with ventilated sides, housing meteorological instruments)

d.f: `用~`以~`保護~`測定~`空氣~`溫度~`和~`溼度~`的~`儀器~，`使~`其~`不致~`直接~`受~`陽光~、`降水~、`凝結~`影響~`的~`木~`箱~。`須~`漆~`成~`白色~，`四~`週~`有~`百葉窗~，`使~`空氣~`流通~。`通常~`安置~`在~`離地~`數~`呎~`高~`的~`架~`上~。

English: Stevenson screen (white box with ventilated sides, housing meteorological instruments)
